title.rendered: Louie Reznick discusses his mediation style

content.rendered: Louie has expertise in personal injury law, negligence insurance law and contractual disputes. He has experience handling difficult cases and demanding clients, and knows how to bring matters to resolution. View his bio here.

excerpt.rendered: Louie has expertise in personal injury law, negligence insurance law and contractual disputes. He has experience handling difficult cases and demanding clients, and knows how to bring matters to resolution. View his bio here.
